title: An Alternate History of the 2022 Midterms
description: In the campaign’s final days, Democratic strategists are already back-seat driving, second-guessing and what-iffing.
dc:creator: Blake Hounshell

media:content.media:description: Senator Bernie Sanders wrote recently that “while the abortion issue must remain on the front burner, it would be political malpractice for Democrats to ignore the state of the economy.”
